name: Canvas, Coffee & Wine | ARAKU Coffee X Paint Bar
description:
Join us for an unforgettable evening where art meets indulgence! Paint Bar and
ARAKU Coffee invite you to _Sip, Swirl, & Stain_—a unique workshop that blends
coffee with painting, while you sip on a glass of wine!  
Learn the art of **coffee painting** under expert guidance and and enjoy a
complimentary glass of wine. Whether you're an experienced artist or a curious
beginner, this relaxed, social evening promises creativity, conversation, and
a touch of sophisticated fun.  
  
> Step by step guidance by an artist  
> Beginner friendly  
> All Materials provided. Canvas size is 12 by 16 inches  
> Children are welcome for all workshops.  
> Includes a complimentary glass of wine per person  
> Food & Other Beverages will be available on purchase  
  
**Perfect for:** Friends’ night out, date night, solo creativity time, or
anyone looking to try something new.

**Flow of event :**  
> First 15 minutes : Entry and introductions  
> 90 minutes : Coffee Painting workshop  
> 15 minutes : Wrap up & Pictures  

Location : ARAKU Coffee, Indiranagar, Bangalore
